sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.IDResult</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Simple container class for the result of a CI Identifier.</description> <name>IDResult</name> <script><![CDATA[// Discovery class
/* * Simple container class for the result of a CI Identifier. An instance of this class has the following initialized fields: * * explore: a boolean, true if this CI should be further explored. * sys_id: a String containing an existing CI's sys_id, or null if no existing CI could be found. */ var IDResult = Class.create();
IDResult.prototype = { initialize: function(explore, sys_id) { this.explore = explore; this.sys_id = sys_id; },
type: 'IDResult' } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>tom.dilatush</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2009-12-07 14:52:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>69a0759a0ab3015000f436d53214229a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>IDResult</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="CI Identification" source="com.snc.ci.identification">e222c9476d6620100acb70b353433000</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_69a0759a0ab3015000f436d53214229a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>tom.dilatush</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2009-12-07 14:52:48</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>536</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
